cgudesc1: Green-U is a service platform for individuals and professionals, allowing user account creation and content publishing.
cgudesc2: These Terms of Use (ToU) govern access to and use of the Green-U platform.
cgudesc3: Green-U allows users to publish services, search for jobs, and access offers from professionals and individuals.
cgudesc4: Users must create an account to access certain platform features. Personal data will be collected during registration.
cgudesc5: Personal data collected during registration or use of the platform is stored in a database for the purposes of the service. This data will be processed in accordance with our privacy policy.
cgudesc6: The privacy policy describes how personal data is collected, used, stored, and protected. It is available on the Green-U platform.
cgudesc7: The user agrees to comply with applicable laws and not to publish illegal, defamatory or offensive content on the platform.
cgudesc8: All content (texts, images, logos, etc.) on the Green-U platform is protected by copyright and other intellectual property rights.
cgudesc9: Green-U reserves the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. Any modification will be effective as soon as it is published on the platform.
cgudesc10: For any inquiries, contact us via email at :
